summary: This is a forwarded email from July 12, 2019, regarding the coordination of a legal visit for an inmate, instructing staff to have the inmate ready prior to the attorney's arrival. The document appears to be internal jail or detention center communication marked as confidential.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.context: The email is addressed to a Lieutenant, instructing them to ensure a legal visit occurs without issues and to have an inmate ready for their attorney.

events.title: Coordination of Legal Visit
events.description: An email is sent instructing a Lieutenant to ensure a legal visit for an inmate occurs without issues and that the inmate is prepared before the attorney's arrival.

keyFacts: The document is a confidential internal email dated July 12, 2019, concerning the logistics of a legal visit for an inmate.
It instructs a jail Lieutenant to prepare an inmate prior to the attorney's arrival to ensure the visit occurs without issues.
The email is marked as 'CONFIDENTIAL' and originates from a Verizon Samsung Galaxy smartphone, indicating it may be official but mobile correspondence.
